1.21.1.5.1.1:
- Fixed block breaking speeds
- Fixed Link USB typo
- Oxidized Copper Jammers can now be scraped properly
- All blocks require a stone tool or better now
- Fixed issue where it was possible to turn off the camera when in camera mode.

1.21.4.5.2.0:
- Port from CCTVCraft 5.1.1 to NeoForge 1.21.4.
- Cleaned up the block model paths to make it easier for future porting.

1.21.8.5.3.0:
- Ported from CCTVCraft 5.2.0 to NeoForge 1.21.8
- Updated camera, monitor, and jammer block models and textures.
- Added description to lockpicks.
- Added description to the iron pinlock.
- Added localization for Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Portuguese, and Spanish.
- Bottom half of secure doors now handle permissions when breaking.
- Some blocks now require proper permission ownership/membership to break.
- Fixed some block right-click actions when holding a block.
- Fixed new line description issue in some item tooltips.
1.21.8.5.3.1: - Fixed secure hatch and secure doors not breaking properly when in creative mode.
